name: Academy Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text: Once the Society of Mishra took control, the Tolarian Academy at Lat-Nam became a haven for dark research.

name: Aggressive Sabotage
oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Target player discards two cards. If this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Squee's orders basically came down to "attack the squishy parts."

name: Argivian Cavalier
oracle_text:
Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)
When Argivian Cavalier enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: Argivian Phalanx
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control.
Vigilance
flavor_text: New Argive welcomed the kor people when they were displaced by the Rathi overlay. The kor repay that kindness with fierce loyalty.

name: Artillery Blast
oracle_text: Domain — Artillery Blast deals X damage to target tapped creature, where X is 1 plus the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor_text: To conserve ammunition, Jhoira modified ancient Thran artillery cannons to fire gouts of pure Shivan lava.

name: Automatic Librarian
oracle_text: When Automatic Librarian enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Enforcing absolute quiet with extreme prejudice since 3285 AR.

name: Barkweave Crusher
oracle_text: Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Phyrexia may be ancient, but Gaea is eternal."
—Queen Allenal of Ruadach

name: Battlefly Swarm
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Battlefly Swarm gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: Having encountered the bitter Phyrexian battleflies before, Squee knew not to bother eating them—or at least to stop after the fifth.

name: Battle-Rage Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Since when is it cheating to give one side an unfair advantage?"
—Braids

name: Benalish Faithbonder
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "A single light can hold back endless darkness."

name: Benalish Sleeper
oracle_text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Benalish Sleeper enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Even he didn't know what he was until he felt his skin shifting and splitting, his mind overtaken by a chaos of whispers.

name: Bite Down
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
flavor_text:
"Yavimaya takes care of herself; the kavu are evidence of this. What does your Coalition offer that the forest cannot provide?"
—Jenson Carthalion

name: Bog Badger
oracle_text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Bog Badger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"Steel may be more durable, but nothing channels the spite of the unjustly dead like bone."
—Braids

name: Broken Wings
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Serra guides our shots true. Also, I just tuned the cannons."
—Tiana

name: Captain's Call
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"Argivia's walls may run on powerstones, but its real power comes from its people."
—King Darien XLVIII

name: Charismatic Vanguard
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This battlefield is an anvil, my mace a forging hammer . . . and you, Phyrexian scum, are the scrap metal that's about to be reshaped as I see fit."

name: Citizen's Arrest
oracle_text: When Citizen's Arrest enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Citizen's Arrest leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text: "What lurks behind the faces of those you think you can trust?"

name: Clockwork Drawbridge
oracle_text:
Defender
{2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: Argivia's clockwork fortifications are the stuff of legend, reminding all on Dominaria that ingenuity has saved them before and can do so again.

name: Coalition Warbrute
oracle_text:
Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)
Trample
flavor_text: Anger is his greatest weapon, and he sharpens it daily.

name: Colossal Growth
oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, instead that creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

name: Contaminated Aquifer
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Contaminated Aquifer enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: The caves stretch farther than anyone knows, and the terrible legacy of Yawgmoth lurks in every shadow.

name: Crystal Grotto
oracle_text:
When Crystal Grotto enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Deathbloom Gardener
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "I can provide the Coalition with poisons that will break down Phyrexian machinery as easily as they stop the heart."

name: Destroy Evil
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Serra's grace most often manifests as a healing touch, but it may also grant a merciful death.

name: Eerie Soultender
oracle_text:
When Eerie Soultender enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
{4}{B}, Exile Eerie Soultender from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Elfhame Wurm
oracle_text: Vigilance, trample
flavor_text: The wurms consume everything in their path, so the elves make sure that their path goes through as many Phyrexians as possible.

name: Essence Scatter
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text:
"Phyrexians pollute everything they touch, so the solution is simple: don't let them touch anything."
—Teferi

name: Extinguish the Light
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. If its mana value was 3 or less, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Jaya did not want to die, but of all the things to die for, Dominaria felt right.

name: Floriferous Vinewall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Floriferous Vinewall enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Flowstone Infusion
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The rumor that contact with flowstone would reveal Phyrexian sleeper agents was spread mostly by Phyrexian sleeper agents.

name: Flowstone Kavu
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{R}: Flowstone Kavu gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The kavu adjusted easily to the Rathi overlay, incorporating the invasive flowstone into their own adaptable forms.

name: Furious Bellow
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Minotaurs sometimes pretend to be lost in a battle rage, leading their opponents to underestimate their cleverness.

name: Gaea's Might
oracle_text: Domain — Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Why fight over the lumber in a tree's trunk when its branches have room for all?"
—Multani

name: Geothermal Bog
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Geothermal Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: There are still a few places where the natural dangers outweigh even those posed by Phyrexian sleeper agents.

name: Ghitu Amplifier
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
When Ghitu Amplifier enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Ghitu Amplifier gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Gibbering Barricade
oracle_text:
Defender
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Who needs stone walls when you can hide behind an impenetrable barrier of screaming nightmares?"
—Braids

name: Goblin Picker
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

name: Griffin Protector
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Hammerhand
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)

Vigilance

Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures also gain trample until end of turn.

oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:

name: Lightning Strike
oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Danitha watched in shock as electricity lanced from Jaya's fingertips, obliterating the charging Phyrexians. "What?" said the pyromancer serenely. "I told you I'd learned some new tricks."

name: Llanowar Stalker
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Llanowar Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If you spot one elf in Llanowar, it's likely there's another with a knife at your back.

name: Magnigoth Sentry
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: When one of Yavimaya's enormous magnigoth trees awakens into a treefolk, it is a towering presence of physical strength and ancient wisdom.

name: Meria's Outrider
oracle_text:
Reach
Domain — When Meria's Outrider enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

name: Mesa Cavalier
oracle_text:
Flying
When Mesa Cavalier enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the fight to defeat Phyrexia, the courage of Benalish knights is matched only by that of their pegasus steeds.

oracle_text:
When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
Trample

({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
